Connect with me

  • Github
  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter

Howdy! I'm James Williamson, web designer, educator, and all around opinionated simple primate. I'm passionate about web standards, accessibility, and teaching best practices to beginning web developers. I have authored dozens of courses at Lynda.com for both the beginner and advanced web designer! Thanks for visiting!

© 2017 James Williamson | all content offered under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International. Feel free to reproduce anything on the site with proper attribution. I've disabled comments on the blog, so feel free to get in touch if you want to discuss anything!
